DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether osteopathic manipulative treatment ( type spinal manipulative therapy use osteopathic physician ) ultrasound physical therapy effective treatment chronic low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Osteopathic Health Outcomes Chronic Low Back Pain ( OSTEOPATHIC ) Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether osteopathic manipulative treatment ( type spinal manipulative therapy use osteopathic physician ) ultrasound physical therapy effective treatment chronic low back pain . This study use 2X2 factorial design test hypothesis .
DOC.criteria: Must give positive response question : `` Have low back pain constantly day last three month ? '' Must identify low back primary site pain Must agree receive follow outside study period participation : osteopathic manipulative treatment , chiropractic adjustment ( include `` mobilization '' `` manipulation '' ) , physical therapy Women must pregnant plan become pregnant period study participation ( negative pregnancy test willingness maintain acceptable method contraception require ) History follow condition may underlie cause low back symptom : cancer , spinal osteomyelitis , spinal fracture , herniated disc , ankylose spondylitis , cauda equina syndrome History surgery involve low back within past year plan low back surgery future History receive Workers ' Compensation benefit within past three month Involvement current litigation relate back problem Current pregnancy plan become pregnant course participation study Any following may limit provider 's choice osteopathic manipulative treatment technique hamper compliance study protocol : angina congestive heart failure symptom occur rest minimal activity , history stroke transient ischemic attack within past year Any follow may represent potential contraindication receive ultrasound physical therapy : implantation cardiac pacemaker , implantation artificial joint biomedical device , active bleed infection low back , pregnancy Use intravenous , intramuscular , oral corticosteroid within past month History osteopathic manipulative treatment , chiropractic adjustment , physical therapy within past three month three occasion past year Practitioner student follow : osteopathic medicine ( D.O . ) allopathic medicine ( M.D . ) , chiropractic ( D.C. ) , physical therapy
